title: Diamond Floral Crescent Necklace - Chandramukhi Haar Design
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Features a beautifully crafted crescent-shaped design reminiscent of traditional South Indian floral motifs. The intricate openwork setting maximizes diamond brilliance, arranged in a graduating pattern. Each diamond is meticulously set to create a sparkling effect. Modern interpretation of the Chandramukhi (crescent moon) shape.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a statement. Suits both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
as well as modern evening wear.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends modern diamond setting techniques with traditional South Indian design aesthetics. The brilliance of the diamonds is amplified by the expert Hyderabadi polish. A versatile piece that can be treasured for generations.
